statements: DELETE FROM Vendor_and_Supplier_Relationships WHERE supplier_city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Vendor_and_Supplier_Relationships WHERE vendor_id = 101 AND supplier_id = 201;
DELETE FROM Vendor_and_Supplier_Relationships WHERE supplier_city = 'New York' AND vendor_city = 'Los Angeles';
DELETE FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 100 AND vendor_name = 'Company XYZ';
DELETE FROM supplier WHERE name = 'Supplier ABC';
DELETE FROM vendor WHERE name = 'Acme Corp' AND email = 'acme@example.com';
DELETE FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name = 'Apple Inc.';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'XYZ Corp';
DELETE FROM supplier WHERE contact_name = 'John Doe';
